scenario.name: UAC_invite
scenario.send: INVITE sip:[field1]@[remote_ip] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];rport;branch=[branch] Call-ID: [call_id] From:[field0] <sip:[field0]@[remote_ip]>;tag=[call_number] To:[field1] <sip:[field1]@[remote_ip]> CSeq: 1 INVITE Allow: INVITE,ACK,BYE,CANCEL,UPDATE,INFO,PRACK,SUBSCRIBE,NOTIFY,REFER Contact: sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 62 Supported: timer,100rel,histinfo,join,norefersub,precondition,replaces User-Agent: App test Content-Length:[len]

ACK sip:[field1]@192.168.78.240 SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Call-ID: [call_id] From:[field0] <sip:[field0]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>;tag=[call_number] To:[field1] <sip:[field1]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] CSeq: 1 ACK Contact: sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 62 Route: <sip:[remote_ip];lr> Content-Type: application/sdp
